body.name: MegaChef Electric Easily Portable Ultra Lightweight Dual Coil Burner Cooktop Buffet Range in Matte Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 47 mins
features: COOKING ON THE GO NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD: The best choice for your Kitchen on the Go! There’s no need to sacrifice your favorite home cooked meals simply because you choose to explore or travel! With this sleek Dual Burner Cooktop, you can prepare those home cooked meals with ease no matter where you are, so long as you have an electrical outlet, you are ready to cook up a storm!

DUAL COIL BURNERS: Dual coil burners provide you with the option to prepare two dishes simultaneously right on this compact take along stove. No more waiting for one dish to be cooked before starting to prepare another! You will love the convenience this cooktop will add to your cooking routine. Individual heat settings for each burner will provide you with the option to cook your meals at just the right temperature.

ULTRA COMPACT AND EASY TO STORE: This versatile kitchen tool can come in quite handy at home as well! Should you find yourself in a dorm room, camper or cabin and having limited space availability this cooktop has you covered. It will easily fit into most spaces, and will cool down quickly once you have completed cooking and unplugged it from the electrical outlet to avoid unnecessary heat.

EASY TO USE: Simply plug in your MegaChef Cooktop, Choose your cookware and place it on top of your burners, Turn on the burners to your desired heat level, and cook! Once you’ve finished up, simply unplug your cooktop and allow it to cool for about 20 minutes. After it’s completely cool, store it in a dry cool place of your choosing!
This Cooktop Measures in at : 18 Inches in Length by 9.5 Inches in Width and 2” in Height Each Burner Measures in at 5.5 Inches
body.description: The MegaChef Electric Easily Portable Ultra Lightweight Dual Coil Burner Cooktop Buffet Range in Matte Black is the best choice for your Kitchen on the Go! There’s no need to sacrifice your favorite home cooked meals simply because you choose to explore or travel! With this sleek Dual Burner Cooktop, you can prepare those home cooked meals with ease no matter where you are, so long as you have an electrical outlet, you are ready to cook up a storm! This ultra lightweight and compact cooktop brings the power of your stove to any desired location. Easily portable and lightweight for your convenience, ensuring that you won’t have to choose between this useful tool and any other belonging you may need to take along with you. This versatile kitchen tool can come in quite handy at home as well! Should you find yourself in a dorm room, camper or cabin and having limited space availability this cooktop has you covered. It will easily fit into most spaces, and will cool down quickly once you have completed cooking and unplugged it from the electrical outlet to avoid unnecessary heat. This Cooktop can also be used at home for those times when your stove is just not enough! We’ve all found ourselves cooking a holiday meal or simply spending time with our loved ones when you simply don’t have enough burners to go around! Well, that crisis is now solved with this easy to store and use powerful cooktop. Dual coil burners provide you with the option to prepare two dishes simultaneously right on this compact take along stove. No more waiting for one dish to be cooked before starting to prepare another! You will love the convenience this cooktop will add to your cooking routine. Individual heat settings for each burner will provide you with the option to cook your meals at just the right temperature and a handy power indicator light will give you peace of mind. A matte black finish adds style and a sleek appearance to this wonderful kitchen addition!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us MegaChef offers you quality, reliability and affordability because with everything you balance in your life, kitchen essentials should be one of your simplest choices. Our lines are made to be versatile and fit effortlessly into any kitchen environment. From the warm bustling kitchen of young families, to the sleekest loft bachelor pads, we have you covered. MegaChef believes that when you purchase one of our items you should love your item from the first time you use it. We honor the undeniable need for function and simplicity with every line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We have no complains about this item...It works really well...It is a good deal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This unit heats up really quickly.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product, I was able to cook my pasta, sauce, and vegetables as quickly as if I was using a gas range. This unit heats up as soon as you put the dial on 1. I was able to regulate the heat with the dial from 1 - 5 (5 being the hottest and highest). I was also able to keep my veggies warm by placing the dial on 1. After cooking, I turned the dial beyond 1, pass the three dots, as well as unplug the unit to ensure the unit is off and will begin to cool down. Place the unit on a stable and flat surface to ensure your pots do not tilt and spill causing injury. This was a This was a great purchase and it exceeded my expectation.. it was very much worth the money,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gets HOT super fast!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Pro:1. It gets hot super fast! This is the strongest feature of this hotplate. I fry eggs on medium level. Otherwise, my eggs get burnt.2. very light to carry3. Nonetheless, stay stable even if I place a stock pot (3 ply stainless steel 5 qt pot) on one side of the coil plate.4. the black metal case is super easy to clean. food that gets dropped in this part do not get burned (however, if you spill food on the silver round plate under the coil, it is hard to clean. try not to fill the pot near to the rim.)cons1. kind of fragile. use it gently.don't do stir fry that may cause friction between the pot/pan and the plate. mine went on strong for 4 months only. after doing a lot of stir fry, it applied stress on some connection and it doesn't get hot as fast.2. two coil plates do not get the same power. left performs better than the right. if you turn on both, the performance is decreased slightly overall. however, i am able to boil water on both simultaneously, even though left sooner than the right.although my first plate slowed down in its performance due to "friction," i bought a second one thinking it will last a lot longer if I used it gently. I have used a lot of hot plates and I don't think I can find any other plate that can get hot really fast like this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I picked it
reviews.reviewText: It was a toss up between this and another one. Very happy that I chose this one instead. It works great for us. Might need to buy a second one so I can have 4 burners!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast.
reviews.reviewText: Just what we needed. Heats up fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars doesnt work as it should
reviews.reviewText: Takes forever to heat up a small pot of water or pan. isn't easily cleaned if anything gets in between coils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shipping was rough.
reviews.reviewText: My package was lost randomly. I had to get a refund then a week later it showed up on my porch out of nowhere. The product is light and feels like it is made from cheap materials. To boil water you need to use a quart sized pan. It will boil nothing over that size. I've only used one burner at a time so I'm unsure if one burner gets hotter than the other. There's no way to remove the burner coils so you have to be extremely careful to not drop anything under them, because it's nearly impossible to clean out if you do. Product showed up 2 weeks late, but I got a full refund so I guess I cannot complain that much.

I did a lot of research before deciding on which cooktop to get. I had to substitute a hotplate cooktop that stopped working after 7 months and decided to get a coil one. I've been using it at least 3 times a day for a week now and it's working perfectly. I've seen a lot of reviews complaining how slow this would heat things but I had the exact opposite experience. On the right coil, which is supposed to be the weaker one, I was able to boil a cup of water (around 250ml) in under 3 minutes.For now I am very satisfied with my purchase. For the price, I just hope this can work for a few years. The product offers a 90 day Warranty, but if you leave a review and register on their website, your warranty extends to a full year.
Vérifié qu'il fonctionne, atteindre le maximum a pris une minute et demie environ. Acheté en vue de circonstances particulières, nous allons en savoir davantage lors de la prochaine panne électrique.

La cuisinière est pratique, légère et facile à utiliser. Je lui aurais donné 5 étoiles, mais la livraison m'en fait enlevé une. C'est écrit sur la page de livraison que celle-ci était effectuée par FedEx, mais en réalité c'était par Purolator, ce qui fait que j'ai failli rater ma livraison! En plus, le produit n'a pas été livré à domicile tel que demandé. J'ai dû aller dans un point de cueillette pour le chercher.Edit: Je suis revenue modifier mon premier commentaire. Au bout de 10 mois d'utilisation, une des bobines ne fonctionne plus. Qualité médiocre, comparée à celle de mon ancienne cuisinière, qui avait duré 5 ans. Je dois donc enlever 2 étoiles.
